# Test fbd config command

fbd init --prefix test

# Set a config value
fbd config set jira.url 'https://example.atlassian.net'
stdout 'Set jira.url'

# Get the config value
fbd config get jira.url
stdout 'https://example.atlassian.net'

# List all config
fbd config list
stdout 'jira.url'

# Set another value
fbd config set jira.project 'TEST'

# Unset a value
fbd config unset jira.url

# Verify it's gone - list should not show the URL
fbd config list
! stdout 'example.atlassian.net'
stdout 'jira.project'
